Posts.Content: Aug 30, 2010 11:29AM devinsgram wrote: My surgery was in July also, BMX.  I, too,  have a lot of swelling in both breasts; more where lymph nodes were removed.  Yes, it IS very uncomfortable!  Some days I take a few hours off from the compression bra ( dont' know if I should but it helps me get through).  My Physical Therapist said massage helps, but it has to be from a PT trained in oncology massage as there are specific strokes and pressure.  She taught me how to do self-massage in one area,and it actually seems to be helping!  I like the suggestion of thinking the body thinks it was in an accident...Dr.s and family/friends remind me that I had 2 major surgeries ( and a minor surgery) in 5 days, so give my body and self a break. ( However, any other suggestions on how to manage the chronic discomfort of the swelling would be appreciated mightily:)  Hang in there, ladies, this too shall pass!!!
Posts.Title: Still swollen under arms - need advice Dee2010 devinsgram
